Gatherer:AlchemyBag.NAME: Alchemy Bag
Gatherer:AlchemyBag.FLAVOR: A mysterious bag with the power of recurring potions.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain a random #ygatherer:Lesser_Potion.

Gatherer:MiracleBag.NAME: Miracle Bag
DESCRIPTIONS: Not replaced #yAlchemy #yBag. NL At the start of each combat, obtain a random potion (to your regular potion slot).
Replaces #yAlchemy #yBag. NL At the start of each combat, obtain a rare potion (to your regular potion slot).

Gatherer:IronSlate.NAME: Iron Slate
Gatherer:IronSlate.FLAVOR: A map to follow the Ironclad's path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #b2 of your Strikes change color to red and gain #b2 damage.

Gatherer:SilentSlate.NAME: Silent Slate
Gatherer:SilentSlate.FLAVOR: A map to follow the Silent's path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #b2 of your Defends change color to green and gain #b2 #yBlock.

Gatherer:FloralEgg.NAME: Floral Egg
Gatherer:FloralEgg.FLAVOR: Eggs like flowers. Or they are eggs like flowers
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #yupgrade ALL your #ygatherer:Flower cards. Whenever you add a #ygatherer:Flower card to your deck, it is #yUpgraded.

Gatherer:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
Gatherer:Leftovers.FLAVOR: How alchemists make new material from leftovers is a mystery.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a Potion, gain a random #ygatherer:Lesser_Potion with #b20% chance.

Gatherer:ExplorersPath.NAME: Explorer's Path
Gatherer:ExplorersPath.FLAVOR: Sometimes it's worth to explore the worst path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn for the next #b3 combats. NL You can now see the pick ratio of cards in the reward screen. NL Choose the lowest-picked card to gain [E] for #b1 more combat. NL Synergy:
, you can choose one of the 2 lowest-picked card for a charge.
